name: Deviant Brawl (Early Concept v2)
description:
Bots have been added. Knockback was also added, but it only works with the bot.

Arrow keys to move

 Up arrow to jump

 Hold M for fast punch (Won't work while walking or in air)

 Hold Up arrow + N for sword attack

M while in air for spin kick

(Kurbo's voice might sound a bit weird. I used text to speech.)
